useCase.name: Add New Room Category

preconditions.precondition: Admin is logged in and has access to the room category management page.

useCase.trigger: User requests to add a new room category through the UI.

mainSequence.step: Admin requests to add a new room category.
UI displays the add room category form.
Admin submits the new room category data.
Room category is successfully added with a 200 OK response.
UI displays a success message indicating the room category has been successfully added.
